description:
If a coverage-report directory conflicts, the error message is
incomplete like the following:

$ nova coverage-start --combine
Coverage collection started
$
$ nova coverage-report --html test01
Report path: /tmp/nova-coverage_Krl__k/test01
$
$ nova coverage-start --combine
Coverage collection started
$ nova coverage-report --html test01
ERROR: Directory conflict: %s already exists (HTTP 400)
$
title: incomplete message of coverage directory error

comments.content:
If a coverage-report directory conflicts, the error message is
incomplete like the following:

$ nova coverage-start --combine
Coverage collection started
$
$ nova coverage-report --html test01
Report path: /tmp/nova-coverage_Krl__k/test01
$
$ nova coverage-start --combine
Coverage collection started
$ nova coverage-report --html test01
ERROR: Directory conflict: %s already exists (HTTP 400)
$

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/43863
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/43863
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/3277bf3d7bfc3faa4ff3f96e6c77ee4eacfa9f45
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 3277bf3d7bfc3faa4ff3f96e6c77ee4eacfa9f45
Author: Ken'ichi Ohmichi <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Aug 27 20:03:51 2013 +0900

    Fix the message of coverage directory error
    
    If a coverage-report directory conflicts, the error message is
    incomplete like the following:
    
    $ nova coverage-start --combine
    Coverage collection started
    $
    $ nova coverage-report --html test01
    Report path: /tmp/nova-coverage_Krl__k/test01
    $
    $ nova coverage-start --combine
    Coverage collection started
    $ nova coverage-report --html test01
    ERROR: Directory conflict: %s already exists (HTTP 400)
    $
    
    This patch fixes the message.
    
    Fixes bug #1217315
    
    Change-Id: Ie21b0e87262a3caef36d93711ee96529ec699cec
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
